info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 9:46PM MDT until June 12 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HARDING...NORTHEASTERN MORA AND SOUTH CENTRAL COLFAX COUNTIES... At 945 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Springer, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Springer, Maxwell and Miami. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 398 and 435. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.
